price: 2. Kaadu nabiyow ku-Rabbik wacyik koi obtam katay, diggah Yalli abba haytaanamak adda yaaxigi kinni.
arabic: وَٱتَّبِعۡ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ مِن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-ittabiʿ mā yūḥā ilayka min rabbika inna al-laha kāna bimā taʿmalūna khabīran
